description.text:

Therefore, without missing a beat, Ferro tied my feet and arms and forced me on my knees.

He pulled me tight on his big knot and unload his cum in my maw. Wave after wave of hot semen hits my throat and his sticky, salty cum flowed slowly down my gullet, into my stomach.
